build.script:
for file in src.dev/components/**/*.scss
do
	sass $file $file.css
done
cat src.dev/components/*/*.scss.css > src.dev/components/components.css
sass src.dev/css/niui-core.scss src.dev/css/niui-core.css
cat src.dev/css/niui-core.css src.dev/components/components.css > dist.dev/bundle.css
./node_modules/clean-css-cli/bin/cleancss -o dist.dev/bundle.min.css dist.dev/bundle.css
rm src.dev/components/components.css

./node_modules/rollup/dist/bin/rollup --no-treeshake --format=cjs -- src.dev/script/niui-core.js src.dev/components/**/*.js > dist.dev/bundle-temp.js
./node_modules/rollup/dist/bin/rollup  --no-treeshake --format=cjs --banner "window.nui = (() => {" --footer "initComponents(); return { initComponents, copyButton, componentModal, addComponent, componentNotify } })();" -- dist.dev/bundle-temp.js > dist.dev/bundle.js
rm dist.dev/bundle-temp.js
./node_modules/terser/bin/terser -o dist.dev/bundle.min.js --compress --mangle -- dist.dev/bundle.js
#gzip-size --raw n-carousel.min.css > n-carousel.min.css.size
gzip-size --raw dist.dev/bundle.min.js > dist.dev/bundle.min.js.size
gzip-size --raw dist.dev/bundle.min.css > dist.dev/bundle.min.css.size
